oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man called Gemsbok Leg, or !kwai-!kwa, goes hunting with a companion and they pursue a leopard that seems to disappear, but it has deceived them and is lying in wait. It kills !kwai-!kwa before he can warn his companion, who is also attacked. 1) p.5418v: Dia!kwain describes how Gemsbok Leg (!kwai-!kwa) got his name; Dia!kwain heard this story from his mother (=kamme-an), 2) p.5442v: how the leopard attacks a person, 3) This story is found in Book V-18.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Leopard hunting: the fatal adventure of !kwai-!kwa and his companion, and advice about leopard-hunting
